item.title: September 1st, 1879, South African Museum (from !nanni and Tamme)
item.summary: !nanni and Tamme contribute words and sentences, mainly furnishing the !kun names of animals that they saw in the South African Museum as well as some other vocabulary.
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book XI & XII-1
item.author: !nanni (XI)
Tamme (XII)

keyword.subkw: names of animals given by !nanni and Tamme at SA Museum
